text: Bank of America Plaza is a 72-story, late-modernist skyscraper in Dallas, Texas, United States. It is the tallest skyscraper in the city, the 3rd tallest in Texas and the 40th tallest in the United States. Construction began in 1983 and the tower was completed in 1985. ==Building Hours== Monday 9AM-10PM Tuesday 9AM-10PM Wednesday 9AM-10PM Thursday 9AM-10PM Friday 9AM-10PM Saturday 9AM-10PM Sunday 9AM-10PM ==References== Category:Skyscrapers in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Texas Category:Dallas
title: Bank of America Plaza (Dallas)
